root.description: Title ChangeThe game was originally released using the name of a previous game in the franchise: Where in Time is Carmen Sandiego? The title was changed to Carmen Sandiego's Great Chase Through Time after The Learning Company acquired Br√∏derbund Software, Inc. in 1998.
